Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;spirits^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Nice work! Now, we'll have one last recipe to do.

So *hic* with all these mashed fruits we're ready to make some ^green;shpirits^white;. You'll need some ^orange;yeast water^white; and ^orange;water^white; too. Bring all to the ^green;distiller^white; and do yer magic! *hic*
